pullrequest.title: Remove the leading space before command line to make copy experience better

content.raw:
This is the link http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_from_source&cat=install I was following to install from source, without the diff in this PR. 
When copying command line, there will be multiple leading space, the preview you replied looks much better. But let me know your preference :)
